titles.title: For the relief of Herman J. Koehler, III.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 4/13/1999--Introduced. Relieves a named individual of any disabilities imposed upon him which prohibited him from shipping or transporting in interstate or foreign commerce, or possessing in or affecting commerce, any firearm or ammunition, or from receiving such firearm or ammunition as a result of his conviction of a conspiracy to commit an offense against or to defraud the United States.
